revision.text: Possibly: Directions For Studying I. A General System or Body of Divinity. II. The Thirty nine Articles of Religion. To which is added St. Jerom's Epistle to Nepotianus. By Thomas Bennet, M.A. Rector of St. James's in Colchester. (London : Printed by M. J. for James Knapton at the Crown in St. Paul's Church Yard, and Edmund Jeffrey Bookseller in Cambridge, 1714). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2413798~S1
